data.actual_result: Channel list will be displayed from the top, middle or even bottom \*\*Note:\*\* This can also be reproduced by switching between servers.
data.expected_result: Channel list will always display the channel list from the very top
data.short_description: Channel list doesn't always display from the top
data.steps_to_repro: - Hide several channels (7+) - Have at least 4 channels visible - Close app and reopen it
